title: Increase in MS - effect on PL and RGDP

content.question: Assume a countryâ€™s banking system has limited reserves. With an upward-sloping aggregate supply curve, an increase in the money supply will affect the price level and real gross domestic product (GDP) in the short run in which of the following ways?

choices.label:
Price Level
 Real GDP

Decrease
 Decrease

Price Level
 Real GDP

Decrease
 Increase

Price Level
 Real GDP

Increase
 Decrease

Price Level
 Real GDP

Increase

Price Level
 Real GDP

No change
 No change

content.answer:
Price Level
 Real GDP

Increase
 Increase

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
